original: Hañci diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
amanussitthiyā tiracchānagatitthiyā nāgakaññāya methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiseveyya, ajeḷakaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya …
Hañci diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
Arahato pahīnā duggati, arahā āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike sadde …
Arahato pahīnā duggati, arahā tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyyāti?
Arahato pahīnā duggati, na ca arahā āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, na ca diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
arahato pahīnā duggati, na ca arahā āpāyike sadde …pe…
amanussitthiyā tiracchānagatitthiyā nāgakaññāya methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiseveyya, ajeḷakaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya …pe…
Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, na ca diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyyāti?
Tena hi diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggatīti.
